altTitles.th: โตเกียวกูล-เล่ม

altTitles.ja: 東京喰種 －トーキョーグール－

description.en:
Lurking within the shadows of Tokyo are frightening beings known as "ghouls," who satisfy their hunger by feeding on humans once night falls. Ken Kaneki, an unsuspecting university freshman, finds himself caught in a world between humans and ghouls when his date turns out to be a ghoul after his flesh.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
description.ru:
Раса гулей существует с незапамятных времен. Ее представители вовсе не против людей, они их даже любят - преимущественно в сыром виде. Любители человечины внешне неотличимы от нас, сильны, быстры и живучи - но их мало, потому гули выработали строгие правила охоты и маскировки, а нарушителей наказывают сами или по-тихому сдают борцам с нечистью. В век науки люди знают про гулей, но как говорится, привыкли. Власти не считают людоедов угрозой, более того, рассматривают их как идеальную основу для создания суперсолдат. Эксперименты идут уже давно…  
  
Ничего этого не ведал Канэки Кэн, робкий и невзрачный токийский первокурсник, безнадежно влюбленный в красавицу-интеллектуалку Ризэ, частую гостью в кафе «Место встречи», где парень подрабатывает официантом. Не думал Кэн, что скоро самому придется стать гулем, и многие знакомые предстанут в неожиданном свете. Главному герою предстоит мучительный поиск нового пути, ибо он понял, что люди и гули похожи: просто одни друг друга жрут в прямом смысле, другие - в переносном. Правда жизни жестока, переделать ее нельзя, и силен тот, кто не отворачивается. А дальше уж как-нибудь!
description.pt-br: Em Tokyo, criaturas conhecidas como "Ghouls" vivem entre os humanos e os devoram para sobreviver. Alheio a eles, o jovem universitário Ken Kaneki leva uma vida pacata entre livros, até que um trágico encontro o coloca diante desses seres e o obriga a lutar por sua humanidade.

description.en:
"I can't live without you!"

A cohabiting yuri couple, Anzu and Mitsuki, have a relationship where they simply can’t live without each other! A lighthearted and sweet Girls' Love comedy that depicts the lovey-dovey everyday lives of this co-dependent couple. ♪
description.ja:
「アナタがいなくちゃダメなの!」
同棲中の百合ップル、あんずとみつきはお互いにお互いなしではいられない関係。
そんなふたりのいちゃラブな日常を描いた、ゆる甘共依存ガールズラブコメディ♪

altTitles.ja: バじゃなくて、ヴァ

Choboraunyopomi x Vanguard

The crazy unit comedy four-panel story begins!

altTitles.ja: アクマでこれは恋じゃない！

description.en: Aguri, is a young girl who is a demon apprentice. She comes to the human world after her teacher assigned her "to make a human fall in love with her". She thinks it will be easy since she is quite famous in the demons' world, but her target, Kyou-kun, is much better than her...

altTitles.ja: 推しに甘噛み

description.en:
Hina is a reclusive otaku vampire. She wants to move to a sacred place for otaku life, but a boy who looks exactly like her favorite vampire lives next door! And this boy seems to have blood that attracts vampires from all over the world...? A bloody love comedy between an otaku vampire and a slightly tongue-tied handsome man!

Note: Adapted from the author’s oneshot that was released in Hana to Yume 10-11/2022 combined issue.
description.ja: 引きこもりオタクの吸血鬼・ヒナ。吸血なんて気持ち悪～いことよりも推しを愛でるのが１番！オタ活のためにアニメの聖地に引っ越そう☆と思ったら、推しに超そっくりな男の子が隣に住んでいた!? しかもこの男の子、世界中の吸血鬼を魅了する血を持っているようで…？

title.en: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon Official Guidebook

altTitles.en: Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid Official Guidebook

altTitles.ja: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン公式ガイドブック メイドラ大全

description.en:
A complete compendium! This official guidebook tells you everything about "Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon" (as of now).
Character profiles for humans and dragons / Recap of the story by volume / Dragon matching test / Guardian knowledge test / Collection of gorgeous illustrations by the best guest artists / Q&A with Coolkyoushinja / Drafts for Chapter 1 / Illustration gallery (in full color)... and more!
It also includes a special chapter newly drawn!
A super-supreme must-have for all Dragon Maid fans!!

altTitles.ja: 転生貴族、鑑定スキルで成り上がる～弱小領地を受け継いだので、優秀な人材を増やしていたら、最強領地になってた～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Kizoku Kantei Skill de Nariagaru ~Jakushou Ryouchi wo Uketsuidanode, Yuushuuna Jinzai wo Fuyashite Itara, Saikyou Ryouchi ni Natteta~

altTitles.en: As a Reincarnated Aristocrat, I'll Use My Appraisal Skill to Rise in the World: I Inherited a Weak Territory, and If I Increase the Number of Capable Personnel, It Will Become the Strongest Territory

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生貴族，以鑑定技能成名～因為繼承了弱小的領地，所以如果增加了優秀的人才，就會成為最強的領地～

altTitles.id: Terlahir kembali menjadi seorang bangsawan dengan skill penilaian
Seorang bangsawan yang bereinkarnasi, bangkit dengan kemampuan analisis

altTitles.pt-br: Como um Aristocrata Reencarnado, Usarei Minha Habilidade de Avaliação para Subir no Mundo

altTitles.vi: Quý Tộc Tái Sinh Thăng Tiến Nhờ Kỹ Năng Thẩm Định: Vì Thừa Kế Một Lãnh Địa Nhỏ Yếu, Nên Khi Tuyển Dụng Người Tài, Đã Trở Thành Lãnh Địa Mạnh Nhất
Tái Sinh Thành Quý Tộc Với Kĩ Năng "Thẩm Định"

description.en: After being reincarnated, Ars Louvent is supposed to live in a different world as a weak aristocrat. Both his physical strength and intelligence were mediocre in both worlds, but here he naturally possessed a skill called "Appraisal" that allowed him to see the potential of any person. By gathering talented people by his side, Ars uses this "Appraisal" skill to transform his weak territory into the strongest one! But the road ahead of him won't be so simple.
description.ja: 転生し、弱小貴族として異世界を生きることになったアルス・ローベント。現代同様、異世界でも体力・知力ともに平凡だったが、“鑑定スキル”という人の潜在能力を知ることが出来るスキルを生まれつき所持していた。アルスは自分の民たちを守るため、“鑑定スキル”で弱小領地を最強の領地へと変貌させていく───！
description.vi: Sau khi được tái sinh, Ars Louvent được cho là một quý tộc yếu kém. Cả sức mạnh thể chất và trí tuệ của cậu đều ở mức trung bình ở cả 2 thế giới. Nhưng cậu sở hữu một kĩ năng độc nhất có tên ' Thẩm định' cho phép cậu có thể nhìn được chỉ số và tiềm năng của mọi người. Bằng cách tập hợp những người tài năng về bên cạnh, Ars sẽ sử dụng kĩ năng 'Thẩm định' này để khiến lãnh thổ yếu ớt của mình thành nơi mạnh nhất! Nhưng con đường phía trước của cậu sẽ không hề dễ dàng.
description.pt-br: Após ser reencarnado, Ars Louvent deve viver em um mundo diferente como um aristocrata fraco. Tanto sua força física quanto sua inteligência eram medíocres em ambos os mundos, mas aqui ele naturalmente possuía uma habilidade chamada “Avaliação” que lhe permitia ver o potencial de qualquer pessoa. Ao reunir pessoas talentosas ao seu lado, Ars usa esta habilidade de “Avaliação” para transformar seu território fraco no mais forte! Mas o caminho à sua frente não será tão simples.

title.en: Ookami wa Tsuki ni Koi wo Suru

altTitles.ja: オオカミは月に恋をする

altTitles.en: Wolf Falls in Love with Moon

altTitles.vi: Nàng Sói Trót Phải Lòng Với Mặt Trăng

description.ja:
俺だけが知ってる、先輩の顔。俺のことが嫌いなはずの先輩に「好き」と言われてしまった───。

完璧だけどちょっぴり怖い生徒会長、『オオカミ先輩』こと狼川琉奈。そして、チャラくてポンコツな副会長・月山雄牙。二人はなにもかも正反対。ーーーひとつ、お互いに秘密の顔があることを除いて。ある時、月山は秘密にしているアルバイトを通じて、オオカミ先輩の裏の顔を知ることになり…!?

altTitles.id: Mencoba menjadi pemilik keluarga yang dicuri

altTitles.en: I Plan to Become the Master of a Stolen Family

description.ar:
“لو أصبحت رب الأسرة ، لكان الكثير قد تغير …” مات أخي التوأم بيدي. يتحكم بها بالسحر الأسود ، كلوي ، التي تكرر الذبح غير المرغوب فيه ، ينتهي بها الأمر بقتل شقيقها التوأم بيديها. بدون وقت للحزن ، كان رأس السيف موجهًا إلى قلب كلوي. لقيت كلوي موتًا بائسًا. ولكن عندما فتحت عينيها، عادت إلى الماضي. لن أكرر حياتي الماضية. من أجل حماية الأسرة وشقيقها الحبيب ، قررت أن تصبح رب الأسرة بنفسها ، في شكل أخ توأم. “متوقع. أنتم جعلتموني هكذا.”

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54824372), [Naver](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8629075), [Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2057181273)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B9%BC%EC%95%97%EA%B8%B4-%EA%B0%80%EB%AC%B8%EC%9D%98-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%B8%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%98%EB%A0%A4-%ED%95%A9%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3182), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60828356)
description.en:
The Duchy of Francesca rules the northern provinces on behalf of the fallen Imperial family. After the sudden death of the lord of their household, Duke Den, the twins Damian and Chloe become puppets at the hands of their relatives. Controlled by dark magic, Damian becomes the empty-shelled lord of the household while Chloe, who has a natural talent for swordsmanship, becomes an assassin repeatedly committing unwanted murders. Later deemed no longer useful, she falls to dark magic and kills Damian with her hands before meeting her own tragic ending afterward. However, when she opened her eyes once more, she returned to the past. To the past – the day of her beloved father’s, Duke Den’s funeral. From then, Chloe made a decision. A decision to not allow her past life to repeat itself... and to punish her relatives and the vassals who dared turn their backs on her family.

---
“So many things would have been different if you had become the family head…”

*My older twin brother died at my hands.*

Chloe, who was controlled by black magic and forced to murder endlessly against her will, ultimately ends up killing her older twin brother. With barely a moment to mourn, the tip of her sword was immediately pointed at Chloe’s heart. Chloe died a miserable death. But when she opened her eyes again, she realized that she had gone back in time.

*I won’t repeat my past life. In order to protect my family and my beloved older brother, I will personally become the master by becoming my brother.*

“Look forward to it. You are the ones who pushed me to this point.”

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54824372), [Naver](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8629075), [Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2057181273)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B9%BC%EC%95%97%EA%B8%B4-%EA%B0%80%EB%AC%B8%EC%9D%98-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%B8%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%98%EB%A0%A4-%ED%95%A9%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3182), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60828356)
description.id:
Duchy of Francesca memerintah provinsi utara atas nama keluarga Kekaisaran yang jatuh. Setelah kematian mendadak tuan rumah tangga mereka, Duke Den, si kembar Damian dan Chloe menjadi boneka di tangan kerabat mereka. Dikendalikan oleh sihir gelap, Damian menjadi penguasa rumah tangga yang bercangkang kosong sementara Chloe, yang memiliki bakat alami dalam ilmu pedang, menjadi seorang pembunuh yang berulang kali melakukan pembunuhan yang tidak diinginkan. Kemudian dianggap tidak lagi berguna, dia jatuh ke sihir hitam dan membunuh Damian dengan tangannya sebelum menemui akhir tragisnya sendiri sesudahnya. Namun, ketika dia membuka matanya sekali lagi, dia kembali ke masa lalu. Ke masa lalu - hari ayah tercintanya, pemakaman Duke Den. Sejak saat itu, Chloe mengambil keputusan. Keputusan untuk tidak membiarkan kehidupan masa lalunya terulang kembali .. dan untuk menghukum kerabatnya dan pengikut yang berani meninggalkan keluarganya.

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54824372), [Naver](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8629075), [Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2057181273)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B9%BC%EC%95%97%EA%B8%B4-%EA%B0%80%EB%AC%B8%EC%9D%98-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%B8%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%98%EB%A0%A4-%ED%95%A9%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3182), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60828356)

title.en: Shounin Skill de Maoujou no Kouryaku wo Mezasu ~Isekai Tenishita no de Saikyou Item to Tookujutsu de Ikinuku to ni shita~

altTitles.ja: 商人スキルで魔王城の攻略を目指す ～異世界転移したので最強アイテムとトーク術で生き抜くことにした～

altTitles.en: Aiming to Conquer the Demon King's Castle with Merchant Skills: Since I Have Been Transported to Another World, I Decided to Survive with the Strongest Items and Talk Techniques

description.en:
One day, Sota, a university student, is summoned to another world! Moreover, after being summoned, he was mistaken for a hero and imprisoned in the Demon King's Castle, where he was in a desperate situation...! Sota gets through the predicament with his natural skill, but for some reason he ends up solving the embarrassing problem of Fafnir, a super beautiful demi-human...!? 

Win the hearts of the demi-human girls living in Demon King's Castle and aim to escape from Demon King's Castle! A fantasy romantic comedy that opens up a different world with its natural business spirit, begins!
description.ja:
トーク術と最強アイテム武器に、魔王城を攻略せよ！
大学生のソータはある日、異世界召喚されてしまう！ しかも召喚後、勇者に間違われて即魔王城へ幽閉されて絶体絶命…! 持ち前の口の上手さで窮地を切り抜けるソータだが、なぜか超美少女の亜人・ファフニールの”恥ずかしいお悩み”を解決することに…!? 魔王城に住まう亜人娘たちの心を掴み、魔王城脱出を目指せ！ 持ち前の商魂で異世界を切り開くファンタジーラブコメ…

description.en:
Just by clicking the wrong button, I ended up possessing the game's princess character, "Cherise"! Yoon Che-ri, a graduate of a pharmaceutical university. Like the so-called 'hardcore gamer' she is, She unexpectedly appears in the VR game she plays every day. A red rabbit puts her in debt to the game, owing 10 billion gems...

If she doesn't repay the debt of 10 billion gems, she won't be able to log out?

♡ Surprise Quest Triggered ♡

User's ability confirmed as "Pharmaceuticals," customized settings have been completed accordingly. Future quests will focus on "Pharmaceuticals."

[Confirm] ◀

Huh? Why do I feel excessively capable...? If things go on like this, I might be able to return soon!
Will Cherise really be able to settle the 10 billion gem debt and return to her original world?

One day, Liu Hai happened upon a dilapidated magic book. When she imitated the wizard in the magic book to create a magic circle, she accidentally summoned a monster girl named Chi Liu. Chi Liu is the source of strength in the country of Chi. She had been imprisoned for a long time and finally managed to escape. While Liu Hai in the human world was experimenting with the magic circle, the two met...

altTitles.fr: La vilaine vit encore une fois

altTitles.ja: 悪女は2度生きる
悪女は２度生きる

altTitles.th: ชีวิตที่สองของนางร้าย
ชีวิตครั้งใหม่ ของยัยตัวร้าย

description.de:
Von klein auf lebte Artezia Rosan in dem Glauben, sie könne ein glückliches Leben führen, solange ihr Bruder erfolgreich ist. Als Meisterin der Manipulation und Intrigen wurde sie das wichtigste Hilfsmittel ihres Bruders, um den Thron des Imperiums zu erobern. Genau deshalb traf sie der Verrat ihres Bruders so hart, als sie für ihre Taten gefesselt und gefoltert wurde. Nachdem sie von Großherzog Cedric Ebron gerettet wird, nutzt sie eine verbotene Magie und opfert ihr eigenes Leben, um ihm zu helfen, dem grausamen Kaiser ein Ende zu setzen. Die Ereignisse nehmen eine seltsame Wendung, als sie einige Jahre in der Vergangenheit aufwacht und schwört, Großherzog Cedric um jeden Preis zu helfen, selbst wenn dies bedeutet, ihre eigene Familie aufzugeben. Man sagt, Blut ist dicker als Wasser, aber kann Artezia es schaffen, ihren Bruder zu besiegen, während ihre eigene Romanze inmitten des Chaos erblüht?

---
* [Official Translation (DE)](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/the-villainess-lives-again-de)
description.en: From childhood, Artezia Rosan's happiness was dependent on ensuring the success of her brother. As a master manipulator and schemer, she became his most valuable ally in seizing the empire’s throne. That’s exactly why her brother's betrayal cut so deeply when Artezia was imprisoned as punishment for all of her crimes. Soon after being rescued by Grand Duke Cedric Ebron, she vows to help him overthrow the cruel new emperor by sacrificing her own life with forbidden magic. Now waking up several years earlier back in time, she will forsake her own family to help Cedric at all costs. They say that blood is thicker than water, but can Artezia destroy her brother while her own romance blossoms amidst the chaos?
description.fr:
Depuis son plus jeune âge, Artezia vit dans l’ombre de son frère, dont le succès suffirait à garantir le bonheur et la sécurité de la famille, selon sa mère. Elle devient donc la meilleure alliée de ce dernier, organisant maintes conspirations afin de l’aider à accéder au trône impérial. C’est pourquoi, quand ce but est finalement atteint mais qu’elle se retrouve trahie, mutilée et enchaînée en punition pour ses crimes, son ressentiment n’en est que plus grand. Sauvée par le Grand Duc Cedric Ebron, elle décide alors d’utiliser la magie pour aider ce dernier à détrôner l’empereur cruel qu’est devenu son frère. Un sort magique lui permet de revenir plusieurs années en arrière et de changer le cours des choses… Mais Artezia parviendra-t-elle à changer le destin, alors que l’amour s'immisce au milieu du chaos?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/villainess-lives-again-fr)
description.ja:
謀略の天才、皇帝を作り上げる！ ”お兄様が成功すれば、お前も成功するのよ” それを信じ、あらゆる悪事を企てた悪女「アルティゼア」。 しかし、彼女の兄への忠誠は裏切りとして返ってくる。 死を前にした彼女に手を差し伸べたのは宿敵であり、正義ある大公「セドリック」だけだった。 魔術で命と引き換えに18歳の自分に生まれ変わった彼女は、「セドリック」を皇帝にするために新たな人生を捧げることにするがーー

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/50796)
description.ko:
모략의 천재, 황제를 만들다!

"오빠가 잘되어야 너도 잘되는 거야."

온갖 악행을 저질러 오빠를 황제로 만들었다.
하지만 아르티제아의 헌신은 배신으로 돌아왔다.
죽음의 문턱에서 그녀에게 구원의 손을 내민 것은, 정의로운 숙적 세드릭 대공뿐이었다.

“계책을 내라.”
“…….”
“이 상황을 뒤집을 수 있는 인물을 나는 그대 외에는 떠올리지 못하겠어. 로산 후작.”
“…….”
“나에게는 그대의 힘이 필요하다.”

이미 기울어진 세력 판도를 뒤집고 도탄에 빠진 제국을 구할 계책은 없다.
그러나 방법은 있다.
모든 것이 잘못되기 이전으로 시간을 돌리는 것.

피의 눈물과 함께 그녀는 자신의 몸을 바쳐 고대마법으로 시간을 돌린다.
이번에는, 실패하지 않으리라.

죽지 않고 18세로 회귀한 아르티제아는 세드릭 대공을 위한 악녀가 될 것을 결심한다.

“저에게 청혼해 주십시오. 당신을 황제로 만들어 드리겠습니다.”

악마에게 무릎을 꿇은 대가로,
당신은 당신 대신 손을 더럽힐 악마를 얻을 것입니다.
description.pt: Ao cometer todo tipo de atos malignos, ela fez do irmão o imperador. Mas sua dedicação foi recompensada com traição. À beira da morte, quem estendeu uma ajuda foi seu arqui-inimigo, o justo Grão-Duque Cedric.Não era possível restaurar o equilíbrio de poder para um império que já estava caindo em ruínas, mas havia uma maneira... de voltar no tempo antes que tudo desse errado. Com seu sangue e lágrimas, ela sacrifica seu próprio corpo para lançar magia antiga, a fim de voltar no tempo. Desta vez, ela não iria falhar.
description.ru:
«Твой старший брат хорош, и ты должна соответствовать.»
Она совершила множество злoдеяний, чтoбы сделать своего старшего брата Императором. Однако преданность Артезии обернулась против неё, ведь единственным, кто подал ей руку помощи на пороге смерти, был заклятый враг, эрцгерцог Седрик.
«Уловки прочь.»
«Я не знаю никого, кроме вас, кто мог бы обратить эту ситуацию вспять. Маркиза Розанна.»
«Мне нужна ваша сила.»
Казалось, тогда уже невозможно было спасти Империю, находившуюся в крайне бедственном положении, и предотвратить падение власти. Но всё же был один способ. Повернуть время вспять прежде, чем все пойдёт не так. Она, с кровавыми слезами на глазах, пожертвовала своим телом, чтобы овладеть древней магией и обернуть время вспять. В этот раз она не подведёт. Вернувшись в возраст восемнадцати лет, Артезия принимает решение не покорно умереть, а стать злодейкой и пойти на службу к эрцгерцогу Седрику.
«Пожалуйста, сделайте мне предложение. И я сделаю вас Императором.»
Дабы демoн пал ниц, нужнo запoлучить другoгo, что испачкает руки вместо вас.
description.zh:
前世为助哥哥成王做尽坏事，却反遭灭口…这一世甘为恶女，联手曾经的政治宿敌，夺回操控人生的王座！

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9146/)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%83%A1%E5%A5%B3%E9%87%8D%E7%94%9F/116)
description.pt-br: Ao cometer todo tipo de atos malignos, ela fez do irmão o imperador. Mas sua dedicação foi recompensada com traição. À beira da morte, quem estendeu uma ajuda foi seu arqui-inimigo, o justo Grão-Duque Cedric. Não era possível restaurar o equilíbrio de poder para um império que já estava caindo em ruínas, mas havia uma maneira … de voltar no tempo antes que tudo desse errado. Com seu sangue e lágrimas, ela sacrifica seu próprio corpo para lançar magia antiga, a fim de voltar no tempo. Desta vez, ela não iria falhar.

altTitles.en: I Become a Fool When It Comes to My Daughter

altTitles.ja: 今日も娘が可愛すぎます

description.en:
I've become a single father!

24-year-old Juwon Lee works part-time at a convenience store and lives alone in his small apartment. One day his uncle passes away and leaves behind a 4-year-old daughter, the cute little Yeondu. Instead of letting her be sent to an orphanage, Juwon steps up and decides to be her new guardian.

title.en: I Need Someone to Stop My Older Brothers

altTitles.ko: 누가 우리 오빠들 좀 말려 주세요

description.en:
I only went to calm the disturbance in front of my house, but the one I encountered was the Demon King that I punished, and unfortunately, I was falsely accused of being the demon king and died in the hand of the subjugation team.

‘I’ll kick your ass, Pamel Asinov! I’ll make you shed tears from both of your eyes!’

Among them, the worst one was the hero, Pamel Asinov, who drove me to death as a Demon King!

But when I pleaded to take revenge, I opened my eyes, 500 years later! Pamel’s been dead for a long time, and the ‘brothers’ who came one day…

“Purple eyes. It’s not a color that anyone can have.”
“But I was like this from the beginning.”
“Yes, you were. Because you are the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov.”
“…the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov?”

Of all people, I’m the daughter of ‘that’ Asinov? It’s nice to live a peaceful life, but I was born an enemy’s blood!

‘All the brothers in this house have a habit of hugging people.’

This shitty family. I have to hate them, but why do I keep getting attached to them?

altTitles.ja: 安達としまむら

description.en: In the middle of the school day, on the second floor of the gym. This is where the two came to skip class, and it's where their friendship began. A story of two high school girls, playing ping-pong and chatting as they spend the heydays of their youth.
description.ja: 入間人間が書く電撃文庫の大人気作品『安達としまむら』。TVアニメ化決定の本作を新鋭・柚原もけがコミカライズ！女子校生2人のゆる～い日常をご堪能ください。
description.ru: В середине учебного дня, на втором этаже спортзала. Именно туда эти двое пришли пропустить занятия, и именно там началась их дружба.

altTitles.ja: この関係は合法です!

description.en:
YES Sister, NO Touch!

Kouta, who is extremely siscon, decides to live alone in order to "escape from his little sister ". One day, however, he picks up a runaway girl named Ui, who is full of younger sisterly feelings. Although she looks and acts like a child, she is in fact a beautiful 19-year-old girl with big tits!

Protect his sister? or Crossing the line? The days of agony begin!
description.ja: YESシスター、NOタッチ!?極度のシスコンの洸太は、「脱・妹」を目指し一人暮らしをすることに。だがある日、妹感満載の家出少女・初（うい）を拾ってしまう。顔もしぐさも幼い初だが、実は19歳の巨乳美少女だった！妹を守る？一線を超えちゃう!?悶々の日々が始まる！

altTitles.ja: リィンカーネーションの花弁

description.en: Striving for talent, Senji Touya tries everything he can so he can find it. Kendou, dancing, swimming, basketball, soccer, chess… anything he tries, he fails to exceed it. One day, his classmate, Haito, came to school for once in a long time. Senji refers to her as someone who "has it" or someone who has talent. Later on, he found out that she isn't just someone who has talent, but someone who "took" the talent of herself in her past life. And, those who "took" the talent from their past lives, are also known as "Returners"…
description.vi: Cố gắng tìm kiếm tài năng, Senji Touya thử mọi thứ có thể để tìm ra nó. Kiếm đạo, nhảy múa, bơi lội, bóng rổ, bóng đá, cờ vua… bất cứ thứ gì cậu thử, cậu đều không thể vượt trội. Một ngày nọ, cô bạn cùng lớp của cậu, Haito, tới trường sau một thời gian dài vắng mặt. Senji coi cô là người "có nó" – một người có tài năng. Sau đó, cậu phát hiện ra rằng cô không chỉ là một người có tài năng mà còn là người đã "lấy" tài năng của mình từ kiếp trước. Và, những người "lấy" tài năng từ kiếp trước của họ còn được gọi là "Những Kẻ Trở Lại"…
description.pt-br: Na busca por um talento só seu, Senji Touya tenta de tudo para encontrá-lo. Kendou, dança, natação, basquete, futebol, xadrez… em tudo o que ele tenta, ele não consegue se destacar. Um dia, sua colega de classe, Haito, vem à escola pela primeira vez em muito tempo. Senji se refere a ela como alguém que “possui algo” ou alguém que tem um verdadeiro talento. Mais tarde, ele descobriu que ela não é apenas alguém que tem talento, mas alguém que “conseguiu” o talento de si mesma através de sua vida passada. E, aqueles que “conseguem” o talento de suas vidas passadas, também são conhecidos como “Reencarnados” …

title.en: Kono Ai wo Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.ja: この愛を終わらせてくれないか
Kono Ai o Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.zh: 能让这份爱画上休止符吗

altTitles.vi: Chấm dứt tình yêu này đi được không?

description.en: Yuzu is Hayami Madoka's ardent fan. Having no friends or family that care for her, Madoka is her only solace. Being that Sachiko is Madoka's best friend, she is Yuzu's most hated existence. To vent, she opens a secret account where she posts malicious comments about Sachiko. When she discovers this, she instead attempts to befriend Yuzu and offers her a chance to talk to Madoka. However, an accident occurs and they end up switching bodies with Sachiko being left in coma.
description.vi:
Hachikawa Yuzu, một nữ sinh cấp 3 với cuộc đời học đường ảm đạm có một bí mật. Rằng thực chất cô ấy là một người hâm mộ cuồng nhiệt của Hayami Madoka, bạn cùng lớp và cũng là một nữ diễn viên nổi tiếng.
Yuzu, ngưỡng mộ và tôn sùng Madoka như một nữ thần, cảm thấy hạnh phúc khi chỉ đơn giản được học cùng lớp và nhìn ngắm Madoka mỗi ngày.
Lẽ ra chỉ như thế đã đủ, nhưng cho tới một ngày...
Một câu chuyện tình yêu méo mó nhưng đồng thời cũng vô cùng thuần khiết.

altTitles.en: How to Live as a Fake Healer

altTitles.th: ฮีลเลอร์กำมะลอ

description.en:
One day, Seunghyeon Kang woke up to find himself in an unfamiliar world, on the continent of Azeul. At that moment, a status window pops up: 

[Your class is Healer?]

Wait, but he doesn’t have a single healing skill?! 

And so begins the life of a quack Healer who can’t cast Heal as he struggles to find a way back to his home!

altTitles.ja: 今日から始める幼なじみ

altTitles.zh-hk: 從今天開始的青梅竹馬

altTitles.zh: 从今天开始的青梅竹马

altTitles.ja: 今日おさ

altTitles.vi: Bạn từ nhỏ kể từ ngày hôm nay

description.en:
Kaede Yuzuki is Kouhei Aida's new neighbor, both at home and in the classroom. Kouhei tries to be friendly with Kaede, but their conversations lead nowhere. But then one day…
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/kyo_osa0420)
description.es-la: Kaede Yuzuki siempre deseó tener un amigo de la infancia como en los mangas que lee. Cuando se mudó al lado de su compañero de clase, Kouhei Aida, él dijo que haría cualquier cosa para ayudarla. Entonces, ¡ella le pidió que fuera su amigo de la infancia! ¡Los dos tienen divertidas aventuras recreando todas las cosas que deberían hacer los amigos de la infancia!

title.en: Isekai Furin ll ~Michibika Reshi Hitodzuma Tachi to Bukiyo Tensei Yuusha~

altTitles.ja: 異世界不倫Ⅱ～導かれし人妻たちと不器用転生勇者～

description.en:
An office worker, Yuuto Aida, witnesses his wife's affair at home!  When he jumps out of the house, he gets hit by a truck and is reincarnated in another world as a hero!!  However, due to the misunderstanding about Goddess Reincarnation, he only had one skill, it was a skill that could captivate other people's wives!!

(MTL)
description.id: Suami sibuk bekerja Istri sibuk selingkuh, Seorang pekerja kantoran, Yuuto Aida, menyaksikan perselingkuhan istrinya di rumahnya! Ketika dia melompat keluar rumah, dia ditabrak truk dan bereinkarnasi di dunia lain sebagai pahlawan!! Namun, karena kesalahpahaman tentang Reinkarnasi Dewi, dia hanya punya satu skill, itu adalah skill yang dapat memikat istri orang lain!!
description.ja: ごくごく普通のサラリーマン・愛田勇人（あいだ　ゆうと）は、自宅で妻の浮気現場を目撃！家を飛び出したところ、“例のトラック”に轢かれ──勇者として異世界転生することに！！しかし、転生の女神のひょんな勘違いから、たったひとつのスキルだけを彼は手に入れることになった──　それは、“人妻完全魅了（チャーム）”というスキル！世の人妻は皆すべて、彼に魅了される！！！！

description.en:
A naga starts a new job in a new town.

Posted with [author permission](https://twitter.com/DanielLCarrier/status/1769140595296207140).

---
Alternative Official English: [TheDuckWebComics](https://www.theduckwebcomics.com/Snake_in_the_office/5771894/)

altTitles.ja: 南條さんは僕に抱かれたい

altTitles.en: Nanjou-san Wants to Be Held by Me

altTitles.pt-br: Nanjou-san quer ser segurada por mim

description.en: From their worst encounter comes a story about their ultimate happiness! This romantic comedy explores the ups and downs of a serious relationship.
description.ja: 陰キャな清己が忘れ物を取りに戻った放課後の教室。ギャルで有名な南條さんと男子生徒が、○○○しようとしているところを目撃する。逃げ出した男子生徒の代わりに…と誘われるものの、潔癖症の清己はきっぱり断ることに。けれど、それによって興味を持たれてしまい、清己は南條さんに付きまとわれることに！けれど、南條さんは、意外とオタクにとっての理想のギャルで…!?
description.pt-br: Do pior encontro deles surge uma história sobre sua felicidade final! Esta comédia romântica explora os altos e baixos de um relacionamento sério.

altTitles.en: Miss Komi Is Bad at Communication.

altTitles.th: โฉมงามพูดไม่เก่งกับผองเพื่อนไม่เต็มเต็ง

altTitles.ja: 古見さんは、コミュ症です。

altTitles.vi: Komi - Nữ thần sợ giao tiếp

altTitles.pt: Senhora Komi não consegue se comunicar

altTitles.pt-br: Senhorita Komi não consegue se comunicar

altTitles.th: โฉมงามพูดไม่เก่งกับผองเพื่อนไม่เต็มเต็ง

altTitles.zh-hk: 古見同學有交流障礙症

altTitles.zh: 古见同学有交流障碍症

description.en:
Komi-san is a beautiful and admirable girl that no one can take their eyes off of. Almost the whole school sees her as the cold beauty that's out of their league, but Tadano Hitohito knows the truth: she's just really bad at communicating with others.

Komi-san, who wishes to fix this bad habit of hers, tries to improve it with the help of Tadano-kun by achieving her goal of having 100 friends.
description.es: Hitohito Tadano acaba de empezar la secundaria alta anhelando que sea pura paz y tranquilidad, pero sus planes se truncan cuando termina sentado al lado de la perfecta Shoko Komi. Ella es linda, inteligente, educada y hasta huele bien. Pero tiene 0 dotes sociales y no sabe cómo corno comunicarse con los demás. Es ahí que Tadano se sube al pony y se propone ayudarla a su compañera hasta que se haga de cien amigos, y con suerte algo más.
description.pl: Komi-san jest piękną i godną podziwu dziewczyną, od której nikt nie może oderwać oczu. Prawie cała szkoła postrzega ją jako zimne piękno, które jest poza ich zasięgiem, ale Tadano Hitohito zna prawdę: młoda piękność po prostu źle komunikuje się z innymi. Komi-san, chce to zmienić, a ma jej w tym pomóc Tadano.
description.es-la: El viaje a 100 amigos comienza con una sola conversación. El mayor sueño de la estudiante de secundaria socialmente ansiosa Shouko Komi es hacer amigos, ¡pero todos en la escuela confunden su ansiedad social paralizante con una reserva fría! Con todo el cuerpo estudiantil manteniendo su distancia y Komi incapaz de pronunciar una sola palabra, la amistad podría estar siempre fuera de su alcance. Tadano Hitohito es un chico ordinario total, y así es como le gusta. Vive para mezclarse con el fondo. Todo eso cambia cuando se encuentra solo en un salón de clases el primer día de la escuela secundaria con la legendaria Komi. Rápidamente se da cuenta de que ella no es distante, sino que tiene problemas para comunicarse con los demás. ¡Ahora ha hecho su misión ayudarla en su búsqueda para hacer 100 amigos!
description.pt-br: Komi-san é uma bela e admirável garota que ninguém consegue tirar os olhos. Quase todos da escola a veem como alguém fora do alcance, mas Tadano Shigeo sabe a verdade: **ela apenas não sabe como se comunicar com os outras pessoas**. Komi-san, que deseja corrigir este mau hábito dela, tenta melhorar com a ajuda do Tadano-kun...

description.en: To meet his dead parents again, Hong Bin made a deal with the Baseball Fairy, who agreed to return him to the past if he achieved 3,000 career hits as a baseball player. And at the age of 40, Bin the baseball legend hits his last ball and goes back in time. After reuniting with his family, Bin decides to pursue his old dream of joining the major league. The only issue is that he's lost all his old skills as a pro! But will his past experiences be enough to help this legend fulfill his new goal?

altTitles.ja: 暴君の寝室担当侍女になりました

description.en:
When Lee Chaerin kicks the bucket, she's whisked into a dark fantasy novel as Rose Estania, a chambermaid at the mercy of the tyrant crown prince, Kalix Forsman. Armed with nothing but her real-world hotelier skills and a diary from the real Rose full of cryptic hints but no escape route, she's forced to navigate a dangerous world teeming with Kalix's enemies. Can she keep his wrath in check, evade death, and find her way back to reality before it's too late?

---
Your Highness- That is absurd!!

"Your Highness, did you just cough-!!!"

I'm doomed! I've been transmigrated to another world! As an extra chambermaid from a 19+ impoverished novel from the early 2000s! For now, I'm trying my best not to upset the male lead's temper so I can survive and return home...

"Your Highness! Please have mercy!"

"Your Highness! That is such an absurd thing to say!"

"Could you please stop with that damn antiquated language?!"

Seems like the etiquette here is a bit different from what I know...

Anyway, after defeating an assassin and taking an arrow for him, I feel like I've become somewhat closer to the male lead.

The ominous journal that seems to understand my words, and the male lead, who orders me around, seems a bit fishy too. Can I survive here and return home?

title.en: Rei no Heya ni Irerarechatta Osananajimi no Futari

altTitles.ja: 例の部屋にいれられちゃった幼馴染の2人

altTitles.en: A Pair of Childhood Friends Who Were Put into One of "Those" Rooms

description.ja: 幼馴染のせいじとまい。ある日2人が目が覚ますと、2人はなぜかネットでよく見る「○○するまで出られない部屋」に入れられていた。○○するまで出られない部屋について何もしらないせいじ。せいじのことが気になっているため、絶対せいじに何の部屋なのか知られたくないまい。果たして2人はこの部屋から出ることはできるのか？部屋から出るための条件は…やっぱりアレなのか？

altTitles.ja: 日本史探偵コナン

description.en:
Conan and the Detective Boys are asked to help kids who have been send backwards in time. These "Time Drifters" explore different eras of Japanese history in search of the Time Stones that will help them return to the present day.  
  
[Official Website](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/pr/ntconan/)

altTitles.ja: スグルくんファイト!

description.en:
When Suguru, an ordinary high school student, comes home as usual, he bumps into his older sister's friend, Noriyuki! 

Deciding at first glance that the huge and rugged-looking Noriyuki is the type he doesn't like, Suguru leaves the house to escape from him, but for some reason Noriyuki starts to pester him persistently...!?

title.en: The Artistic Genius of Music Is the Reincarnation of Paganini

altTitles.en: High School Musical Genius Is Paganini Reincarnated

description.en: The Rebirth of Paganini, Joo-won Moon. He was once a gifted violinist, but due to an injury, he gradually distanced himself from music and lived the life of a regular high school student. “I don’t pursue music.” However, perhaps the irony of fate… Joo-won Moon accidentally transferred to the music class of an arts high school, he picked up the violin… Will Joo-won Moon be able to overcome his psychological trauma? And is there a chance for him to be reborn as a true violinist?

altTitles.ja: J⇔M　ジェイエム

description.en:
J is a lone assassin feared as "untouchable" in the underworld.
Megumi is a lonely girl who has no place at home or school.
When the two meet, an unexpected story begins.
description.uk: Джей - самотній найманий вбивця, якого у злочинному світі вважають "невразливим". Меґумі - самотня дівчинка, якій немає місця ні вдома, ні в школі. Коли вони познайомилися, розпочалася несподівана історія, Джей та Меґумі обмінялися тілами. Тепер, Джей змушений взятися за завдання по вбивству у своєму новому тілі.

altTitles.fr: Héros ? Ça fait longtemps que j'ai arrêté

altTitles.zh-ro: Ying xiong? Wo zao jiu bu dang liao

altTitles.ru: Герой? Я давно перестал им быть

altTitles.en: Hero? I Quit a Long Time Ago

description.en:
Zero was mankind’s first real superhero. Under his watch, countless other superheros appeared and followed in his footsteps. However, after 5 years of war, Zero disappeared without a trace.


---

**Note:** this is not your usual Chinese manhua, please read them from right to left (similar to Japanese format).

**Links:**
- [KuaiKan](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/1002/)
description.it: Zero fu il primo supereroe della razza umana. Sotto la sua guida, innumerevoli supereroi comparvero e crebbero seguendo le sue orme. Tuttavia, dopo cinque anni di guerra, Zero scomparve senza lasciare traccia. (*si legge da destra a sinistra, come i manga*).
description.pl: Zero był pierwszym prawdziwym superbohaterem ludzkości. Podczas jego aktywności pojawili się niezliczeni nowi bohaterowie, którzy podążyli jego ślady. Jednakże, po 5 latach walki, Zero zniknął bez śladu.

description.en: Panthera, a totalitarian state where both brutal oppression and despair exist. Heroes who resisted the government were branded as traitors and executed. Now, the son of a fallen hero, Eden, must face the question: Can he survive in Panthera? In the near future, after a second nuclear war, the surviving humans continue to live in a small world called Panthera. However, the intense control and exploitation by the government has caused immense suffering, gradually turning various districts into slums. The “heroes” who once defied the regime and claimed to be superheroes were ruthlessly eliminated by cyborg killers under the government’s command. The few surviving heroes now hide their identities, barely scraping by in the slums. Disillusioned and filled with grief and hatred, people who once had a glimmer of hope in these heroes have now lost faith and stopped waiting for any saviors. One day, a seemingly ordinary high school student named Eden, who is frequently bullied by his classmates, experiences a “Soma Awakening,” a unique trait of superheroes. However, haunted by the memory of his father’s gruesome death as a hero, Eden rejects the life of a hero, longing for a normal life with his mother. Yet, the increasing oppression of the government and the threats to his only family make this difficult. In such a world, will Eden choose to become a hero and stand against the forces oppressing society? The journey of Eden—a beautiful yet scorched, intense yet chilling tale—begins.

title.en: Confessing My Love to Him, the Treacherous One

description.en: When Natalie went back in time after her death, her only desire was for revenge. Instead, she accidentally confessed to the most dangerous man in the empire?! Natalie, the only daughter of the Count, was tricked by her stepmother and stepsister into marrying an abusive scumbag before dying tragically. After going back in time, she decided to turn her back against them and prepared to interfere with her stepsister’s love for the young master of the Duke’s mansion, Eli. But what she didn’t expect was for an accident to occur, and she ended up confessing to his uncle instead?! Help, this man is notorious for being difficult to deal with! Is it too late now to withdraw the confession?

altTitles.ru: Военный раб, ставший мастером боевых искусств

description.en:
The Murim Warring States period is where only the strong survives. This is the war slave Cheong Gwang and Myeong-Wol’s Murim Survival Story.

---

- [Original Webtoon <kakao>](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59153035)
description.ko:
강자만이 살아남는 무림전국시대.
전쟁노예 천광과 중원제일의 기생 명월의
무림 생존기를 그린 가족 무협 액션 드라마.

---

- [Original Webtoon <kakao>](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59153035)
description.ru:
Главный герой - Чон Гван, будучи ребенком, попадает в военное рабство. Больше десяти лет он не видел своего отца и сестренку. Согласно уговору с преемником одной из сильнейших гильдий, он должен принести голову двадцати мастеров боевых искусств, и только тогда ему даруют свободу. Чон Гван жил мыслью о скором возвращении домой, однако... его обманули. Тогда он решает сбежать...

---

- [Original Webtoon <kakao>](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59153035)

altTitles.ja: 新ルパン三世

description.en:
Lupin the Third and his motley crew return in Shin Lupin III! This time, several of the stories are either brand new or adapted from or to the Lupin anime, and the beginning story was even animated by itself several years later!  
  
Lupin the Third is the grandson of the famous literary thief Arsène Lupin, and his partners in crime include the sharpshooter Jigen Daisuke, the stoic samurai Goemon Ishikawa the Thirteenth, and the on-again-off-again lover/enemy Fujiko Mine. Their goal is to outwit enemies bigger than themselves while nabbing the world's rarest and most important items, while also outwitting the dogged Inspector Zenigata, who's made it his life's work to capture and secure Lupin. In the manga however, his relationship with the titular thief isn't as "respecting to the enemy" as you would expect, as he's attempted multiple times to kill him without shedding a tear!   
  
What kind of sexy exploits will Lupin and his crew get up to next in…Shin Lupin III!

title.en: Multiverse no Watashi, Koishite Ii desu ka?

altTitles.ja: マルチバースの私、恋していいですか?

altTitles.en: Is It Alright for My Multiverse Self to Fall in Love?

altTitles.vi: Em của đa vũ trụ có thể yêu anh được không?

altTitles.ja: マル恋

description.en:
Jogo has a crush on his classmate, Miyato. 

One day, they unexpectedly end up walking home together after school. When Miyato is about to be hit by a truck, Jogo throws himself in harm's way to save her. In the final moment before impact, Jogo wishes he could have told Miyato how he felt. 

But then he hears a mysterious voice saying, "You can do it over. This time, don’t have any regrets."

When he wakes up, he finds himself unharmed, lying on the ground, with a different version of Miyato beside him — she looks the same, but her clothes and hairstyle are different...?
description.ja:
本当なら出逢えていなかった、私とあなた。好きだと言わなくても後悔はしない？

可能性を切り拓く、マルチバースラブコメ読切！

title.en: Dai Uchuu Kaijuu Dai Bouei Taisen

altTitles.ja: 大宇宙怪獣大防衛大戦

altTitles.en: The War With Space Monsters to Protect the Earth

title.en: Realist Maou ni Yoru Seiiki Naki Isekai Kaikaku

altTitles.el: Η θρυλική ανακατασκευή ενός κόσμου από έναν ρεαλιστή βασιλιά δαίμονα

altTitles.ru: Король демонов — реалист. Легенда о перестройке мира

altTitles.ja: リアリスト魔王による聖域なき異世界改革

altTitles.zh: 现实主义魔王的异世界改革

altTitles.ko: 리얼리스트 마왕에 의한 성역없는 이세계 개혁

altTitles.zh-hk: 現實主義魔王的異世界改革

altTitles.en: The Legendary Rebuilding of a World by a Realist Demon King
The Reformation of the World as Overseen by a Realist Demon King

altTitles.pt-br: A Reconstrução Lendária de um Mundo por um Rei Demônio Realista

description.en:
In a dilapidated castle, Astaroth awoke as a Demon King. With his ‘wisdom from his past life,’ he would rule over his lands as a thorough ‘realist.’ “Demon King, why are you attacking the level 1 Heroes?” “Defeat them before they become stronger. That is called strategy.”  “Demon King, why are you sending fake money to the enemy country?” “To bring chaos to their economy, so they will self-destruct.” “The werewolf troops have attacked. Should we use silver bullets?” “Not bullets, shoot them with cannons.”  
  
And like that, Astaroth ‘reformed’ the old tendencies. He became a lord who was loved by the people and his subordinates, and he would go on to be called the most powerful Demon King in history.
description.ja: 72の魔王が跋扈する混沌とした世界に、72番目の魔王として転生したアシュタロト。そんな彼の前に突如謎の女神が現れ、この世界を改革するようアシュタロトを導く。初めに召喚したメイド兼参謀の魔族・イヴを従え、現実主義者（リアリスト）魔王の伝説がはじまる！
description.pt-br: Em um castelo em ruínas, Astaroth acordou como um Rei Demônio. Com sua "sabedoria de sua vida passada", ele governaria suas terras como um completo "realista".Conheça quem se tornou um senhor que era amado pelo povo e seus subordinados, o homem que seria chamado de o mais poderoso rei demônio da história.

altTitles.ja: レッドブルー

description.en: Suzuki Aoba, a gloomy, social outcast, is satisfied with his Highschool life though he occasionally gets beaten up by his classmate Iwase Sannosuke in "play-fights". One day, Aoba is saved from a "play-fight" by none other than Akasawa Kenshin, a boy from the class next door and the rising rookie superstar sensation of the MMA world. However, Kenshin wonders aloud if Aoba feels empty when Aoba states that he doesn't have a dream, which Aoba doesn't react to kindly. He vows to land one punch on Kenshin in the future. Aobas joins the Shark Gym lead by the sloppy Kanenari Tokiwa to achieve his dream of besting Kenshin.
description.ja: 日陰者の道を歩んできた主人公・青葉。 譲れぬ“想い”を押し通すため、 総合格闘技“MMA”の世界へ飛び込んでゆく――!!
description.pt-br: Uma história sobre o mal humorado Aoba Suzuki e a estrela em ascensão Kenshin Akasawa moldando seus caminhos para o mundo das lutas de MMA.

title.en: Nikagetsugo ni Seibetsu ga Bareru Josou Danshi

altTitles.ja: 2ヶ月後に性別がバレる女装男子

altTitles.ja-ro: Nikagetsugo ni Seibetsu ga Bareru Jyosoudanshi

altTitles.en: The Crossdressing Boy's Gender Will Be Found Out in 2 Months

description.en:
I enrolled in a prestigious girls academy, even though I'm actually a crossdressing boy?! But, in my class lies a secret as well...?

This prestigious school, St. Aster Girls Academy, is where I am entering as a first year. Unexpectedly, I had to crossdress in order to enroll! If my roommate or classmates found out I am a guy, it would be inexcusable!

title.en: Washi Jijii, Yowai Rokujuu ni Shite Tenpu no Sai ni Kizuku

altTitles.ja: わしジジイ 、齢六十にして天賦の才に気付く

description.en: In a world where special abilities called "skills" manifest, sixty-year-old Diru suddenly gains power one day. Unfortunately, it's a combat-focused ability that he struggles to handle now that his physical strength has declined. "I’m already an old man...," he says, but despite his age, he’s filled with determination to make the most of his second chance. With his natural talent for charming people and his slightly overzealous sense of justice and kindness, he embarks on a new life, savoring it to the fullest. A man over sixty begins his second life—a life that's not fast but not too slow, gentle yet intense!

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Monster Breeder ~Cheat wa Arukedo, Nonbiri Ikusei Shiteimasu~

altTitles.ru: Укротитель монстров в другом мире ~Лениво дрессирует монстров с помощью читов~

altTitles.ja: 異世界モンスターブリーダー　～チートはあるけど、のんびり育成しています～

altTitles.th: Isekai Monster Breeder -มีสูตรโกงแต่ก็จะเพาะเลี้ยงอย่างค่อยเป็นค่อยไปครับ-

altTitles.zh: 异世界魔物培育家~带着外挂悠哉养成中

altTitles.zh-hk: 異世界魔物培育家~帶著外掛悠哉養成中

description.en: When sent to a different world, Souta was given the unpopular profession of "Monster Tamer." However, Souta also got the skill "Absolute Domination" which gives him a 100% chance to capture anything!
description.es: Cuando fue enviado a un mundo diferente, Souta recibió la impopular profesión de "Domador de monstruos". ¡Sin embargo, Souta también obtuvo la habilidad "Dominación Absoluta" que le da un 100% de posibilidades de capturar cualquier cosa!
description.ru: Когда главного героя, Соуту, отправили в другой мир, ему досталась профессия "Укротителя монстров". К тому же, ему дали способность "Абсолютное доминирование", которая даёт ему 100% возможность получить всё что угодно.

description.en:
I wanted to design!

A dream I have had since I was 12 years old and have nurtured since then. For thirty years I worked hard, not missing a single day, but the reality is that I'm a construction site manager constructing buildings for other people. If I hadn't made that choice back then... Would I have become an architectural designer? Thirty years after all that, a miracle happened to me.

I went back to my university school days 20 years ago, in 2010.
I'm 22 years old, but with 20 years of field experience, I'm going fulfil my dream of being an architectural designer and make world famous designs of my own!

altTitles.th: เทพยุทธ์พลิกลิขิตสวรรค์

description.en:
In this world, respect is earned with martial arts. Weak martial artists have strengths of tens of thousands of pounds, capable of cracking boulders. And the strong ones can cut off rivers and split mountains. There are even martial kings who know everything and can travel across the universe. Martial art decides your fate as well as your life and death. The weak is humiliated while the strong looks down on the world. This is a a world where the strong bullies the weak. People's statuses are decided by the levels of their cultivation of martial arts. Each faction fights for the title of "The Strongest". Only the strong ones have the right to survive. Even if you are from the same clan or faction, if you are weak, then you will be bullied and kicked out without mercy.  
  
After a car accident, Lin Feng crosses over to this new world into the body of a young master from the powerful Lin Family.  
Will Lin Feng be used by others again or will he forge his own path in this place where, regardless of your family ties or sect, only the strong have the right to live.  


---
description.fr: Dans ce monde, le respect se gagne avec les arts martiaux. Les artistes martiaux faibles ont des forces de dizaines de milliers de pounds, capables de craquer des blocs rocheux. Et les plus forts peuvent couper les rivières et creuser des montagnes. Il y a même des rois martiaux qui savent tout et peuvent voyager à travers l'univers. L'art martial décide de votre destin ainsi que de votre vie et de votre mort. Les faibles sont humiliés tandis que les forts méprisent tout le monde. C'est un monde où les forts intimident les faibles. Les statuts des gens sont déterminés par les niveaux de culture des arts martiaux. Chaque faction se bat pour le titre du "plus fort". Seuls les forts ont le droit de survivre. Même si vous appartenez au même clan ou à la même faction, si vous êtes faible, alors vous serez persécuté et expulsé sans pitié.
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, o respeito é obtido através das artes marciais. A força de artistas marciais fracos é igual a dezenas de milhares de libras, capazes de quebrar rochas. E os fortes podem cortar rios e dividir montanhas. Há até reis marciais que conhecem tudo e podem viajar pelo universo. A arte marcial decide seu destino, bem como sua vida e sua morte. Os fracos são humilhados enquanto o olhar forte para o mundo. Este é um mundo onde os fortes intimidam os fracos. O status das pessoas é decidido pelos níveis de cultivo de artes marciais. Cada facção luta pelo título de "O mais poderoso". Apenas os fortes têm o direito de sobreviver. Mesmo se você é do mesmo clã ou facção, se você é fraco, então você será intimidado e expulso sem piedade.

title.en: The Story of Eren Becoming Conscious of Mikasa

altTitles.ja: ミカサを意識しちゃうエレンの話し
